replies.body: The computer I used to play against all you lovely people went boom and we chucked it out rather than pay a lot of money to get it fixed cause everyone has laptops or iPads and the computer wasn't exactly needed. It's not a case of me not coming back simply because if i dont want to, if i was still in school and had loads of time on my hands to just chill out i wouldnt think twice about coming back. Sorry <3
